channel.title: Why won't my clients work?
channel.description:
Ive tried Moparscape 3.2 several times today but it just won't work. I try sign in and it works at first but after i spawn a cape for myself it loses connection then signs me out. THEN when i try sign back in again it says "Error connecting to server. Must be down."
Anybody know what's wrong or how to fix? :|

item.title: Why won't my clients work?
item.dc:creator: @losty108 losty108
item.description:
@losty108 wrote:

You are lucky anyways… Look thats my error on ALL clients…:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9E1uonp6pmU

Read full topic
